required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety and Efficacy of Lurasidone With Different Initiation Dose in Chinese Acute Phase Patients With Schizophrenia
clinical_study.official_title: The Safety and Efficacy of Lurasidone With Different Initiation Dose in Chinese Acute Phase Patients With Schizophrenia: A Multi-Center, Prospective, Open-Label Study for 6 Weeks

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of Lurasidone initiated with 40mg and 80mg in treatment with acute phase patients with schizophrenia

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of discontinuation due to adverse events

intervention.description: Oral administration with a meal or within 30 min after eating in the evening. The dosage could be adjusted from Day 8.
